entry.title: rails (3.0.0.beta)
entry.content: Full-stack web-application framework.

entry.title: rails (2.3.18)
entry.summary: Web-application framework with template engine, control-flow layer, and ORM.
entry.content: Rails is a framework for building web-application using CGI, FCGI, mod_ruby, or WEBrick on top of either MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite, DB2, SQL Server, or Oracle with eRuby- or Builder-based templates.
